name: Mounted Archery
text: You are skilled at making ranged attacks while mounted.
benefit: The penalty you take when using a ranged weapon while mounted is halved: –2 instead of –4 if your mount is taking a double move, and –4 instead of –8 if your mount is running.
staminaText: When making an attack using a ranged weapon while mounted, you can spend 1 or 2 stamina points to reduce the penalties on the attack roll by double the number of stamina points you spent.
mythicText: Your skill as a rider allows you to take cover and shoot with amazing accuracy.
mythicBenefit: When using the Ride skill to use your mount as cover, you can still make a single ranged weapon attack as a standard action. While your mount is moving, you can expend one use of mythic power to negate the penalties for making ranged weapon attacks while mounted until the beginning of your next turn.
text_zh: 你善于在骑乘时使用远程武器。
benefit_zh: 在骑乘时使用远程武器的减值减为一半。例如，当坐骑以倍速移动时，减值为-2而非-4。坐骑奔跑时，减值为-4而非-8。
mythicText_zh: 你那精湛的骑术使自身能够在隐藏起来的同时进行精准的射击。
mythicBenefit_zh: 当你使用骑术技能来将坐骑作为掩蔽（cover）使用时，你仍旧能够以标准动作使用远程武器进行单次攻击。当你的坐骑移动时，你能够花费1次神话之力，以此来使骑乘时进行远程武器攻击的减值无效，该效果持续至你的下一回合开始为止。
staminaText_zh: 当你在骑乘时使用远端武器做出攻击时，你可以消耗1或2点耐力来降低攻击骰上的减值，降低的减值等于你消耗耐力的两倍。
